name: Invincium Hero
description: The Federation is up to no good, collecting alloys to expand their armies. You pilot a prototype resistance mech suit, capable of using the Federation's precious alloys against them, in the hopes to deal a massive blow to their operation. What you didn't expect was that the Federation also has its own mech suit, made of a mysterious new alloy called Invincium. You cannot hope to defeat this Invincium-clad hero, but hopefully you can survive his onslaught long enough to do your mission and do it well...
